text: Alexandre Borges Corrêa (born February 23, 1966) is a Brazilian actor.Alexandre Borges, o Cadinho de 'Avenida Brasil', revela para CLAUDIA: 'não sou irresistível' He is known for his works on Brazilians soap operas. He was Cadinho in the Brazilian sitcom Avenida Brasil and the journalist Carlos Lacerda in the film Getúlio, ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian movie actors Category:Brazilian television actors Category:Actors from São Paulo
title: Alexandre Borges
